data.description: Support for some specific catalog types
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Why to put in Biblio:: is a little hard to discuss, because this
    can be used for anything at all. The Biblio::Catalog module is being
    developed in conjuntion with Biblio::Thesaurus and another module (I
    still can't think on a good name to it) to maintain digital
    libraries (we are maintaining about 8 projects with these modules).

    I would like to see it on Biblio::Catalog because it would be more
    easy to maintain all my digital library modules.

    In case there is not a good idea, please send me ideas, please ;)
